title: Stray Cat City
description: During an 18-month move to Vietnam, author David Joiner and his girlfriend become sidetracked by an orphaned kitten suffering from a broken leg and living by a bridge where dog- and cat-thieves roam. After rescuing the kitten and arranging for it to be sheltered, however, Joiner and his girlfriend grow increasingly attached to it and take it into their home, only for its real battle for survival to begin. But this isnâ€™t the only cat in need of their help. In STRAY CAT CITY Joiner movingly and humorously chronicles the various street cats they try to help and consider bringing permanently into their lives.
author: David Joiner
